name: df-goor
body: |- wceq(cgoo, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(cgon(cv(s0)), cgoi, cv(s1))))
comment: Define the Godel-set of disjunction. Here the arguments ` U ` and ` V ` are also Godel-sets corresponding to smaller formulas. Note that this is a _class_ expression, not a wff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
